heading.tnt-trx-ref-value: WE MUST EACH RESPOND TO JESUS BY PLACING OUR TRUST IN HIM AS OUR SAVIOUR AND LORD. ONLY THEN CAN WE KNOW GOD PERSONALLY.

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: He saved us, not because of the righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy. He washed away our sins, giving us a new birth and new life. - Titus 3:5
